DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate effectiveness online systematic brief psychodynamic psychotherapy ( SBPP ) via HIPAA compliant web conferencing adult neurotic disorder . Design : Randomized controlled trial . Single blind . Setting : Internet user community , SÃ£o Paulo , Brazil . Participants : Thirty-two adult randomly allocate group receive online systematic brief psychodynamic psychotherapy ( n=16 ) , wait list group ( n=16 ) . Method : Systematic adaptative diagnosis system apply group pre-treatment post-treatment ( post-waiting list ) . Assessment comparison adaptative diagnosis evolution group . Primary Outcomes : The subject treat online brief systematic psychodynamic psychotherapy present increase adaptative efficacy measure systematic adaptative diagnosis scale ( SADS ) comparison wait list group , contrast initial final adaptative diagnostics .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Online Systematic Brief Psychodynamic Psychotherapy Neurotic Disorders : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Residents Sao Paulo city , Graduation complete course , Fluent Portuguese , Basic skills english language , If psychiatric treatment , must treatment stable dosage psychiatric medication least 6 month , Participants diagnosis neurotic disorder ( F03.650 ) , Motivation therapeutic process , Availability 4 month psychotherapy , A personal computer ( IP address ) , web camera , microphone , access 1 Mbps internet connection specific computer configuration access Secure Psychotherapy Virtual Environment , Basic knowledge elementary internet tool , A justify reason impedes person psychotherapy , one : Lack financial resource , Frequent change address due work reason , Mobility restriction related accident , illnesses physical deficiency , Inability arrive psychotherapy appointment due urban chaos . Participants present : schizophrenia diagnostic severe mental illness , drug alcohol dependence abstinence substance abuse , untreated diagnosis illness may cause emotional imbalance , thyroid malfunction , Participants undergo therapeutic process time research , Individuals suicidal ideation clear intent need emergency treatment , Participants posse characteristic need included sample bearer deficiency may compromise treatment mediate computer .
